attributes.action: More Youth Groups, More Resources for Existing Youth Groups
attributes.additional_details: Youth Groups are one of the most effective ways of preventing our young people from becoming disenfranchised. In the long run it will save money spent on processing antisocial crimes and other crimes through the justice system. It will help prevent the horrific riots and looting happening (has happened) across the country now (August 2011). Act now! It is a false economy to be closing youth groups instead of investing in them more!
